non_compliant.section: By downloading any information or material from this Website, you agree on the T&Cs. If you do not agree on them, you must immediately stop accessing any part of the Website and downloading any information or material from it.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous.  It must involve a clear affirmative action.
non_compliant.amend: The user must have the option to access the website and its materials without consenting to the T&Cs. Consent should be separate from other matters and not bundled.

non_compliant.section: You also understand and agree that the Website may include certain communications from Faraday, such as service announcements, administrative messages and the Faraday newsletters, and that these communications are considered part of Website and you will not be able to opt out of receiving them.
non_compliant.legal provisions: The data subject has the right to object at any time to processing of personal data concerning him or her for such marketing, which includes profiling to the extent that it is related to such direct marketing.
non_compliant.amend: Users must be given the option to opt-out of marketing communications, even if these communications are considered part of the website.
